name: rnresequniqs
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2), wceq(crn(cres(c0, c1)), cuni(cqs(c1, c0))))

stmt.origin: syl6req(crn(cres(c0, c1)), cuni(cqs(c1, c0)), cima(c0, c1), wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cres(c0, c1), c2), wceq(crn(cres(c0, c1)), cuni(cqs(c1, c0))))

comment: The range of a restriction is equal to the union of the quotient set. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 19-May-2018.)
